DOC.brief_summary: Trained para-professional health care workers will implement a stepped-care model of depression care in commune health stations in Vietnam.
DOC.brief_title: Paraprofessional Treatment of Depression in Vietnam
DOC.detailed_description: This project focuses on evaluation of a collaborative care system for treatment of depression in Vietnam. This system involves training para-professional health care workers in a stepped-care model system of depression care to be implemented in commune health stations in Vietnam.
DOC.criteria: 1. Age >=18 2. Depression Diagnosis active psychosis, mania, substance abuse, suicidal behaviors, cognitive impairment.
